app.curation.eventSelection.batteryWarni: Image analysis can take a lot of power when creating a Smart Photobook and therefore quickly drains the battery. You might want to charge your smartphone before you continue.
app.curation.eventSelection.missingGeoTa: Hello there, we found that some of your photos do not contain geolocation information. To give you the best photo sorting results, that information helps us a lot. If you want to change your settings, open the Camera App and navigate to → “Settings” → “Save Locations”or “Geotagging”. Simply enable this feature.

Hello there, we found that some of your photos do not contain geolocation information. To give you the best photo sorting results, that information helps us a lot. If you want to change your settings, open the Settings App and navigate to → “Privacy” → “Location Services” → “Camera”. Select “While Using the App”.
app.curation.eventSelection.noMemories.m: We are sad that we could not curate any meaningful photo moments for your photo book. There could be few reasons behind it:
app.curation.eventSelection.noMemories.r: The more pictures you collect, the better suggestions we can provide to you. In the meantime please use our classic photo books or other product categories for curating your print product.
Please provide us full access to your Photo Library in your phone settings.
Limited access permission to Photo Library:
app.curation.eventSelection.onboardingSc: Let us make you a proposal for your photo book. We will pick some of your most important events and sort them on top.
Privacy: Photos are analyzed on the device and remain on the device and are only tranferred when the product is ordered or saved.
Suggestions in the picture overview: Adjust your selection.
Find the best photo: Longpress on photo leads to the detail view.
Save photo book online and add more photos on other devices.
Please note that the loading time may be longer if you have stored your photos in iCloud.
We are happy to receive feedback and wishes from you.
app.curation.eventSelection.title: Choose your Event
app.curation.feedback.body:
What do you want to tell us?
------
$OS_NAME $OS_VERSION
PGX $PGX_VERSION
